name: export_persons_code
query:
MATCH (p:Person)
RETURN 
  id(p) AS id,
  p.bio AS bio,
  p.born AS born,
  p.bornIn AS bornIn,
  p.died AS died,
  p.imdbId AS imdbId,
  p.name AS name,
  p.poster AS poster,
  p.tmdbId AS tmdbId,
  p.url AS url,
  CASE WHEN p:Actor THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS actor,
  CASE WHEN p:Director THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS director;

name: export_movie_code
query:
MATCH (m:Movie)
RETURN 
  id(m) AS id,
  m.budget AS budget,
  m.countries AS countries,
  m.imdbId AS imdbId,
  m.imdbRating AS imdbRating,
  m.imdbVotes AS imdbVotes,
  m.languages AS languages,
  m.movieId AS movieId,
  m.plot AS plot,
  m.poster AS poster,
  m.released AS released,
  m.revenue AS revenue,
  m.runtime AS runtime,
  m.title AS title,
  m.tmdbId AS tmdbId,
  m.url AS url,
  m.year AS year;

name: export_acted_in_code
query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
RETURN 
  id(p) AS person_id,
  id(m) AS movie_id;

name: export_directed_query
query:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
RETURN 
  id(p) AS person_id,
  id(m) AS movie_id;

name: export_user_code
query:
MATCH (u:User)
RETURN 
  id(u) AS id,
  u.userId AS userId,
  u.name AS name;

name: export_genre_code
query:
MATCH (g:Genre)
RETURN 
  id(g) AS id,
  g.name AS name;

name: export_in_genre_rel_code
query:
MATCH (m:Movie)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre)
RETURN 
  id(m) AS movie_id,
  id(g) AS genre_id;

name: export_rated_rel_code
query:
MATCH (u:User)-[:RATED]->(m:Movie)
RETURN 
  id(u) AS user_id,
  id(m) AS movie_id;
